author: scottbw
msg: Updated tests to use UpdateUtils where appropriate, for example to test acquiring updated widget packages, and implemented remaining tests that can be conducted using just the parser. I've also flagged the tests that need to also be implemented in the server for functional testing once we add update support to it.

author: myrnavl
msg: DERBY-5084; convert ijConnName.sql to a ScriptTest junit test
backported adding last test case from trunk, merge commands;

author: scottbw
msg: Added an UpdateUtils class, with utility methods for working with widget updates - checking for available updates, and acquiring updated widget packages over the network
